item.title: The Benefits Of Reiki Healing For Mental and Physical Health
item.dc:creator: Joseph Anim Darko
item.description:
Reiki is a form of energy healing that originated in Japan in the early 20th century. It is based on the idea that there is a universal life force energy that flows through all living things, and when this energy is blocked or imbalanced, it can lead to physical and emotional problems. item.title: 10 Health Benefits of Playing Video Games
item.dc:creator: Joseph Anim Darko
item.description:
Video games have been a popular form of entertainment for decades, but they are often criticized for being a sedentary activity that can lead to health problems. However, recent research has shown that playing video games can actually have a number of health benefits. Here are ten health benefits of playing video games: Improved Cognitive...
